title: Settings Reset
body: So I have been playing LoL for a few years now, and for as long as I an remember even on the old client every time I get into the game and make changes to some settings (key binds mainly) everything resets after the end of the game. Thus, in the next game I have to rebind them. I have seen a few threads about it but no one seemed to post a solution and then it was solved but they never posted the fix. It never really bothered me, but now it kind of does. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
This reset can happen if your config is corrupted, and not syncing to our servers to save.  A config reset should fix that up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
Awesome, that seems to have fixed it! Such an easy fix and for some reason I could never find it, tbh I probably did not look hard enough. Regardless, thanks so much for your help.
